resources.string: This mode is normal minesweeper. The first square won\'t be a mine.
It is possible to solve the entire grid by deduction. No guessing is required. You may need to use the total number of mines in deductions.
It is possible to solve the entire grid by deduction, and there will be at least one 8 (which is also deducible). Knowledge of the 8\'s existence won\'t be needed in deductions.

This mode is normal minesweeper with a twist: there is a help button. The help button will reveal 1 square which isn\'t a mine. If you tap the help button when there are un-flagged deducible mines or un-tapped deducible non-mines, then you lose.
